title: Varinder Bhatia, Joint Vice President- Sales (Solar) at Havells India Ltd. - Energetica India
summary: The article discusses India's flourishing solar industry, government initiatives promoting renewable energy, Havells' contributions, quality products for domestic and international markets, and the future of the Indian solar market.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article emphasizes the growth of India's solar industry, government support for sustainable energy, and companies like Havells investing in solar solutions, which align with the principles of green innovation.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article does not focus on a new or improved business process or product from Havells but rather on their contributions to the solar industry and product quality.
green_product: TRUE. The article mentions Havells' solar grid tie inverters and other solar solutions aimed at reducing environmental impact and promoting sustainability, which fits the definition of a green product.
green_process: FALSE. While the article highlights Havells' commitment to providing quality solar products and ensuring strict monitoring of manufacturing processes, it does not delve into specific green processes used by the company.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335129 - Other Lighting Equipment Manufacturing, 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing, 221119 - Other Electric Power Generation, 221118 - Other Electric Power Generation
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not contain any false or misleading claims about the environmental benefits of Havells' solar products or practices; it focuses on their legitimate efforts in the solar industry.
